resources.string: You don\'t need it anymore as the recovery image is in-built with the A/B partition.
Smart Flasher - A simple app to make flashing recovery zips much easier!
Backing up %s of your device into
The details of the already backed up partitions are listed on this page.
Failed to connect with Google Play Billing client!
Failed to get Boot Partition identity
All the fields are empty! Aborting.
Everything you added to this page will be cleared!
Donation link is not provided by the developer yet!
%s is successfully downloaded. Do you want to flash it?
It seems like the download is failed, or a corrupted file is downloaded!
Warning! You\'re selected a file of ~%s MB for flashing. Flashing bigger files, such as ROM\'s, using this app might be dangerous to your device.
Click the flash button to select and flash a recovery ZIP file without rebooting into custom recovery. The changes will be applied after a reboot.
Warning: Flashing a wrong 'img' file likely brick your device. Please be careful.

Why this issue happened?

Your device is either not rooted, or the root permission is declined for Smart Flasher by you!


Why root permission needed?

In order to flash a recovery zip file, or backup a partition image, Smart Flasher need to reach some top-level system partitions, and is impossible without root!


How can I root my device?

A simple google search will help to find many guides to achieve root on your device. Please have a look at it!


Is rooting a device safe?

Rooting poses some security risk, but it's generally safe to do!
Permission denied for writing to storage!
It is highly recommended to reboot your device after flashing.
Failed to get Recovery Partition identity
Flasher Log file is exported as %s!
If you like to appreciate the efforts of the developer to provide this tool entirely free, please consider sending a small donation by clicking one among the below-provided options!
Support Group link is not provided by the developer yet!
You\'re already supported the development with this item before!
Thank you very much for your support \u2665\nIt will motivate me a lot to continue my projects more active!
Smart Flasher will check for a new version of %s once in a day!
Some of the mandatory fields are empty! Aborting.
Congrats! Update Channel is successfully created at %s. Please host it somewhere and share a direct download link with your users.
The changes you made will be lost!

By linking the above update channel with a proper json file for your device, you can basically add kernel download, and auto-flash (not for all devices) support to any Kernel's available for your device. Please ask your favourite kernel developer to add support to this feature. The downloaded kernel will be available at '%s'.

Tips! You can import a json file created for franciscofranco's (huge ♥ & respect to him) 'FK-Kernel Manager' and it will simply work.

Need more help? Click the dots menu!
You\'ve entered an invalid Url! Aborting.

Kernel Name, Kernel Version & Download Link are the mandatory fields to be filled before clicking the create button.

Change-logs could be provided, either as a well formatted text, or as a link to an online page.

Secure Hash Algorithm (sha1) is optional, but highly recommended to ensure the authenticity of the downloaded kernel.
Please select a file with %s extension!
